gobblin.compaction.conditions

Class RecompactionConditionBasedOnRatio

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.compaction.conditions.RecompactionConditionBasedOnRatio
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RecompactionCondition

    @Alias(value="RecompactionConditionBasedOnRatio")
public class RecompactionConditionBasedOnRatio
extends Object
implements RecompactionCondition
    An implementation RecompactionCondition which examines the late record percentage. If the percent exceeds the limit, a recompaction is triggered.
